summary: Implemented Real-time Data Validation Agent with comprehensive edit checks and automated query generation

features_implemented: Data Validation Plan loading and parsing
EDC data feed parsing and processing
Multi-type validation checks (range, required, logical, format)
LLM-powered logical validation for complex business rules
Automated data query generation for EDC systems
details.test_coverage: Comprehensive unit tests covering all validation types and edge cases
details.compliance: Follows all project standards for configuration, logging, LLM interaction, and testing
